p: In order to ascertain the validity of the experimental findings, additional experiments were conducted. Specifically, 5 different shake-flask cultures of Y. lipolytica (blank experiments—no OMW added into the medium) in which initial glycerol had been adjusted at ~70 g/L were carried out at initial pH = 6.0, pH ranging between 5.0 and 6.0 throughout culture, agitation at 180 ± 5 rpm and T = 28 ± 1 °C. The kinetics regarding biomass production ( Figure 5a), glycerol consumption ( Figure 5b) and citric acid production ( Figure 5c) are presented in the Figure below.
